title: Failed to pull singularity image
body:
I was trying to run the tool, but the job failed to pull singularity image. I was wondering if the container path is correct?

container = 'library://richardcorbett/profyle_tmb/profyle_tmb:v0_4_0'

Thanks.

title: Use bam files as input
body: Hi, can I use BAM files as input? Any suggestion? Thank.

title: Use hg38 genome as reference
body:
Hi, 

I am trying to calculate the TMB and would like to use your tool, but from what I see in the documentation you can only use the hg19 genome as reference. Is there any way to use hg38?

Thank you!
